comments.body: We had in other packages problems with this and it might be useful to install this with `--no-build` but sadly there is currently no stable solution to package JupyterLab extensions with conda. If this or a adaption of it works, please report back in https://github.com/conda-forge/conda-forge.github.io/issues/761.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  script:
    - {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
    - jupyter labextension install jupyterlab-nvdashboard@{{ version }}

requirements:
